name: airpad-mvp
description: Hands-free air instrument web app with voice commands and gesture control

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['.next', 'out', 'dist'].forEach(d => { try { fs.rmSync(d, {recursive: true, force: true}); console.log('Cleaned:', d); } catch(e) {} });"
scripts.clean:cache: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.rmSync('node_modules/.cache', {recursive: true, force: true}); console.log('Cache cleaned'); } catch(e) {}"
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint
